description.english: Complete all the extra jobs in the game
description.german: Schließen Sie alle Zusatzaufträge im Spiel ab.
description.french: Terminer toutes les tâches additionnelles du jeu.
description.italian: Completa tutti gli incarichi extra del gioco
description.spanish: Completa todos los encargos adicionales del juego
description.schinese: 完成游戏中的所有额外工作
description.japanese: ゲーム中の追加仕事依頼をすべて完遂する
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie dodatkowe zadania w grze
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os trabalhos extras no jogo

description.german: Kaufen Sie alles im Laden.
description.french: Tout acheter dans le magasin.
description.italian: Acquista tutti gli articoli del negozio
description.spanish: Compra todo lo que hay en la tienda
description.schinese: 购买商店里的所有物品
description.japanese: 店の商品をすべて購入する
description.brazilian: Compre tudo na loja

description.german: Erreichen Sie den höchsten Straßenruf-Wert.
description.french: Atteindre le maximum de popularité.
description.italian: Aumenta al massimo la tua popolarità
description.spanish: Consigue la reputación máxima
description.japanese: ストリートクレジットを最大値まで上げる
description.brazilian: Maximize seu Conceito nas Ruas

description.german: Erreichen Sie den niedrigsten Straßenruf-Wert.
description.french: Atteindre le minimum de popularité.
description.italian: Scendi al livello minimo di popolarità
description.spanish: Consigue la reputación mínima
description.japanese: ストリートクレジットを最小値にとどめる
description.brazilian: Alcance o mínimo de Conceito nas Ruas

description.english: Give 50% of your income to the citizens
description.german: Geben Sie 50 % Ihres Einkommens an die Bürger ab.
description.french: Donner 50% de vos revenus aux citoyens.
description.italian: Regala il 50% dei tuoi introiti ai cittadini
description.spanish: Dale el 50 % de tus beneficios a los ciudadanos
description.japanese: 収入の50%を市民に与える
description.brazilian: Dê 50% da sua renda aos cidadãos

description.english: Don't give the citizens a single penny
description.german: Geben Sie den Bürgern nichts von Ihrem Einkommen ab.
description.french: Ne pas donner d'argent aux citoyens.
description.italian: Non regalare neanche un centesimo ai cittadini
description.spanish: No les des ni un céntimo a los ciudadanos
description.russian: Не дайте горожанам ни гроша своего дохода
description.japanese: 市民に金を一銭も分け与えない
description.brazilian: Não dê um centavo aos cidadãos

description.english: Complete all missions in one play-through with no more than three cops
description.german: Schließen Sie alle Missionen eines Spieldurchlaufs mit maximal drei Polizisten ab.
description.french: Faire tout le jeu en envoyant trois agents ou moins par mission.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni in una singola sessione di gioco senza utilizzare più di tre agenti
description.koreana: 최대 세 명의 경찰로 한 번의 플레이에서 모든 임무 완료하기
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de una partida con no más de tres agentes
description.schinese: 在不超过三名警察的情况下，一次性完成所有任务
description.russian: Пройдите все миссии за одно прохождение не более чем 3 копами
description.japanese: 一周のプレイで3人以下の警官だけですべてのミッションをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie misje w trakcie jednej rozgrywki nie więcej niż trzema funkcjonariuszami
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as missões em uma sessão com no máximo três policiais

description.german: Verhaften Sie 101 Kriminelle.
description.french: Arrêter 101 malfrats.
description.italian: Arresta 101 criminali
description.spanish: Arresta a 101 criminales
description.japanese: 101人の犯罪者を逮捕する
description.brazilian: Prenda 101 criminosos

description.german: Erweitern Sie das Inventar Ihrer Polizisten.
description.french: Agrandir l'inventaire de vos agents.
description.italian: Aumenta l'inventario dei tuoi agenti
description.spanish: Aumenta el inventario de tus agentes
description.japanese: 警官のインベントリを拡張する
description.brazilian: Expanda o inventário dos seus policiais

description.german: Verletzen Sie 20 Kriminelle am Bein.
description.french: Blesser 20 criminels à la jambe.
description.italian: Ferisci alla gamba 20 criminali
description.spanish: Hiere a 20 criminales en la pierna
description.japanese: 20人の犯罪者の足を傷つける
description.brazilian: Fira 20 criminosos na perna

displayName.japanese: ラストマン・スタンディング

description.english: Complete any mission with one cop
description.german: Schließen Sie eine Mission mit nur einem Polizisten ab.
description.french: Terminer n'importe quelle mission avec un seul agent.
description.italian: Completa una missione con un solo agente
description.koreana: 경찰 한 명으로 아무 임무나 완료하기
description.spanish: Completa cualquier misión con solo un agente
description.schinese: 用一名警察完成所有任务
description.japanese: いずれかのミッションを1人の警官だけでクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua qualquer missão com um policial

description.english: Raise one of your cops to level 10
description.german: Bringen Sie einen Ihrer Polizisten auf Stufe 10.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau 10 avec un de vos agents.
description.italian: Fai salire uno dei tuoi agenti a livello 10
description.spanish: Que uno de tus agentes llegue al nivel 10
description.russian: Прокачайте одного из своих копов до 10 уровня
description.japanese: いずれかの警官をレベル10まで育てる
description.brazilian: Leve um dos seus policiais até o nível 10

description.english: Use "Shock and Awe" three times in a single play-through
description.german: Verwenden Sie "Angst und Schrecken" dreimal in einem Spieldurchlauf.
description.french: Utiliser Choc trois fois dans une même partie.
description.italian: Usa "Colpisci e stupisci" per tre volte in una singola sessione di gioco
description.koreana: 한 번의 플레이에서 "충격과 공포" 세 번 사용하기
description.spanish: Usa «Conmoción y pavor» tres veces en una sola partida
description.schinese: 在一次通关中使用三次“震骇效应”
description.russian: Воспользуйтесь командой “Шок и трепет” 3 раза за прохождение
description.japanese: 1周のプレイ中に「衝撃と畏怖」を3回使用する
description.polish: Użyj „Szoku i przerażenia” trzy razy podczas pojedynczej rozgrywki
description.brazilian: Use “Choque e Espanto” três vezes em uma única sessão

description.english: Raise a cop two levels in a single mission
description.german: Lassen Sie einen Polizisten in einer Mission zwei Stufen aufsteigen.
description.french: Faire gagner deux niveaux à un agent en une seule mission.
description.italian: Fai salire uno dei tuoi agenti di due livelli in una missione
description.koreana: 하나의 임무에서 경찰 한 명으로 2레벨 높이기
description.spanish: Sube a un agente de nivel dos veces en una misión
description.schinese: 在一个任务中让一名警察升两级
description.russian: Прокачайте любого копа на 2 уровня за 1 миссию
description.japanese: 1つのミッションで警官のレベルを2上げる
description.polish: Podnieś dwa razy poziom funkcjonariusza w trakcie jednej misji
description.brazilian: Aumente dois níveis de um policial em uma única missão

description.english: Fulfill an extra job to help catch Warren Nash
description.german: Erfüllen Sie einen Zusatzauftrag, um bei der Jagd auf Warren Nash zu helfen.
description.french: Accomplir une tâche supplémentaire pour aider l'arrestation de Nash.
description.italian: Porta a termine un incarico extra per aiutare nella cattura di Warren Nash
description.koreana: 워렌 내쉬를 잡기 위한 추가 목표 하나 완료하기
description.spanish: Completa una misión adicional para ayudar a atrapar a Warren Nash
description.schinese: 完成抓捕沃伦·纳什的额外工作
description.russian: Выполните контракт, который поможет поймать Уоррена Нэша
description.japanese: ウォーレン・ナッシュ拘束の手助けのため追加の仕事を完遂する
description.polish: Wypełnij dodatkowe zadanie, by pomóc złapać Warrena Nasha
description.brazilian: Conclua um trabalho extra para ajudar a pegar Warren Nash

description.english: Complete the game on Normal Mode
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel im normalen Modus ab.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Normal.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità normale
description.spanish: Completa el juego en el modo normal
description.schinese: 在普通模式下完成游戏
description.russian: Пройдите игру на нормальном уровне сложности
description.japanese: ノーマルモードでゲームをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no Modo Normal

description.english: Complete the game on Relaxed Mode
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel im entspannten Modus ab.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Détendu.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità relax
description.spanish: Completa el juego en el modo tranquilo
description.schinese: 在休闲模式下完成游戏
description.russian: Пройдите игру на облегченном уровне сложности
description.japanese: リラックスモードでゲームをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no Modo Lazer

description.english: Prevent a bank robbery with all your cops intact
description.german: Verhindern Sie einen Bankraub, ohne dass einer Ihrer Polizisten verletzt wird.
description.french: Empêcher un braquage de banque sans aucun de vos agents blessé.
description.italian: Impedisci una rapina in banca lasciando incolumi i tuoi agenti
description.koreana: 모든 경찰이 다치지 않은 상태로 은행 강도 막기
description.spanish: Evita un atraco a un banco con todos los agentes ilesos
description.schinese: 所有警察毫发无伤地阻止一起银行抢劫
description.russian: Предотвратите ограбление банка и сохраните всех своих копов невредимыми
description.japanese: 警官が全員無事な状態で銀行強盗を阻止する
description.polish: Udaremnij napad na bank, by wszyscy funkcjonariusze wyszli z akcji bez szwanku
description.brazilian: Impeça um roubo a banco com todos os seus policiais ilesos

description.japanese: 鉄道駅ミッションをクリアする

description.japanese: 写真スタジオのオーナーを無料で助けることに合意する
description.polish: Zgódź się pomóc właścicielowi studia fotograficznego za darmo
description.brazilian: Concorde em ajudar o dono do estúdio fotográfico de graça
